# Medical Regulations
Medical Regulations are laws that Medical personnel must follow, this also includes securities Corpsman.
[textlink="DNRs" link="DNRs"] stand for Do Not Resuscitate. This can only be done by paperwork.
[textlink="Medical Evaluation" link="MedicalEvaluation"] is the ability for the Chief Medical Officer [bold]to declare someone on-duty unfit for their position.[/bold] This also includes the Commanding Officer, considering there is good medical reasoning and documentation.
[textlink="Quarantine" link="Quarantine"] is the right of Medical personnel to put someone under Quarantine if there is a viral outbreak.
[textlink="Standard Of Care" link="StandardOfCare"] is the Medical personnels morals to provide the best medical care that they can. This also means they need a [textlink="Warrant" link="Warrants"] for any invasive procedures and surgeries.
